summary: Order management system with Excel-based design code mapping for Generic Name and Karigar Name fields
architectural_notes: Master Design Excel format: Column A = DESIGN CODE (uppercase), Column B = Generic Name, Column C = Karigar Name
Design code matching requires normalization: uppercase conversion and whitespace trimming
Dashboard displays unmapped design codes as 'Missing: Generic Name & Karigar Name'
known_issues: Design codes from orders not matching Master Design Excel despite existence in file (case sensitivity/whitespace issue)

existing_features.title: Update Excel parsing logic in excelParser.ts to normalize all design codes by trimming whitespace and converting to uppercase before comparison
Update the Master Design Excel parsing to correctly identify Column A as DESIGN CODE, Column B as Generic Name, and Column C as Karigar Name
Automatically update existing orders with matching design codes when Master Design Excel is uploaded, mapping Generic Name and Karigar Name to orders
Display a confirmation message on the Master Design page after Excel upload showing how many design codes were successfully mapped

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Excel parsing to normalize design codes (uppercase, trim whitespace) for proper matching
Show confirmation of successful mappings after Excel upload on Master Design page
Automatically update existing orders when Master Design Excel is uploaded
